meanings.definition: To beat or thrash with a stick or cudgel.
meanings.sent1: The bully bastinaded the smaller kids on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The farmer bastinaded the rug to get rid of the dust.
meanings.sent3: The chef bastinaded the dough to make it smooth and even.
meanings.sent4: The wind bastinaded the leaves off the trees during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The drummer bastinaded the drumsticks to keep the rhythm steady.

meanings.sent1: The teacher bastinaded the student for cheating on the test.
meanings.sent2: The judge bastinaded the criminal for their actions.
meanings.sent3: The coach bastinaded the team for not giving their best effort.
meanings.sent4: The boss bastinaded the employee for repeatedly being late to work.
meanings.sent5: The parent bastinaded the child for breaking the rules.
